Unofficial API
==============

The Unofficial API are multiple functions used int the BiGR Team. They are designed for Flamingo, and tested only on Flamingo.

For using them, simply follow instructions in each docstring page.

The menu on the left (expand by clicking (+) if necessary), lists all available pipelines.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 3
   :glob:
   :hidden:
   :caption: API

   api_reference/*
